bibl.seg: WORP K.A. (Edited by), Greek Ostraka from Kellis. O. Kellis, Nos. 1-293. With a Chapter on The Ostraka and the Archaeology of Ismant el-Kharab by Colin A. HOPE. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 13.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 2004, 4°, viii-234 pp. et pll. non numérotées (également reproduites sur 1 CD-ROM). ISBN 1-84217-128-3. £65.
O. Kellis 1-293. - Pp. 5-28: Colin A. HOPE, Ostraka and the Archaeology of Ismant el-Kharab.
C.R. par Thomas J. Kraus, BASP 43 (2006) pp. 165-168. - Carlos Sánchez-Moreno Ellart, Aegyptus 86 (2006 [2008]) pp. 320-326. - Fabian Reiter, BibO 65 (2008) coll. 299-320.
